title: 713. Subarray Product Less Than K
description: Find the number of contiguous subarrays where the product of all the elements in the subarray is strictly less than k
code:
if (k <= 1) return 0
var left = 0
var right = 0
var count = 0
var prefix = 1

while (right < nums.size) {
    prefix *= nums[right]

while (prefix >= k) {   
prefix /= nums[left]
   left++
}

count += (right - left) + 1
right++
}

return count
